products.title: Genesis Blackout Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Sleek and elegant, the genesis blackout grey roller blind is a stylish update for any room. The soothing light grey tone of the fabric is subtle yet sophisticated and sits smartly with modern interiors. This smooth rolling blind with impressive blackout quality will enhance the clean and fresh feel of a bathroom, or add a sense of tranquillity to a bedroom.
